short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension which automatically claims Twitch points

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension which automatically claims Twitch points as they become available so you don't have to click yourself. 

How To Use:

Just install the extension, go to Twitch and watch your favorite streamers. The extension will claim your Twitch points for you automatically as they become available.

You can see how many points were automatically claimed by clicking the extension icon.

Features:

- Shows how many points you gathered with the extension, per streamer. You can also delete gathered points
- Dark/Light mode

This extension is open source, you can see the code here: https://github.com/lc-nyovchev/twitch-points-extension and submit issues there as well: https://github.com/lc-nyovchev/twitch-points-extension/issues.

Support:

If you liked that extension, you can show your support by buying me a coffee: https://ko-fi.com/ath3nd
